Html:
First of all, let me just say a great big "thank you" to the developers of this software. Ever since MangaTraders (and to a lesser extent, #lurk) have been unceremoniously shut down, I'm forced to grope around in the dark, and things are especially bad when I'm trying to find older releases.

For the most part, this software worked like a charm, except for these websites:

Animea - cannot list series at all

For the following sites, I can get the series listed, and the "Visit Page" button works; however, I cannot download from it (there's just a big red ERROR):
Kissmanga
Starkana

What I tested with: Nise Koi, chapter 129. I did not test sites that did not have this title, but except for Animea I can at least list the available titles.

Hope this helps!
